Posts.Content: Hi I waited for 2 months after my last chemo and I then had a veg colour treatment which would last about 3 weeks. I did that 2 times and I am not back to normal colours. No highlights just yet though!
Posts.Title: Colouring hair post chemo

Posts.Content: I also had these during my EC.  I was told to expect pains in my "big bones" where white blood cells reproduce.  I felt this most in my hips - panadol and bed rest - with a heat pack around my lower back was my best solution.
Posts.Title: First chemotherapy drugs
